summary: This bill, the Daniel J. Harvey, Jr. and Adam Lambert Improving Servicemember Transition to Reduce Veteran Suicide Act, aims to improve the transition process for servicemembers to address mental health concerns and reduce veteran suicide. It amends Title 10 (Department of Defense) and Title 38 (Department of Veterans Affairs) of the United States Code. It focuses on providing detailed information about mental health services, including treatment options and resources, and also mandates a joint report from the Secretaries of Defense and Veterans Affairs to Congress.
